name: Danse Macabre
overview: Role play in French Search for the murderer who killed the son of the rich Mac Gregor family. Your quest will take you to a medieval England infested with pestilence and scavengers, where the brave chevaliers have given way to hatred and anguish. Your future knowledge of alchemy and Theologia, as well as your warrior abilities, will surely be assets to your investigation, unless the wrath of the Gods comes upon your destiny. For the first time, a role - playing game in French gives you possibilities that you did not dare to hope for: contact with the gods, making magic potions, etc.moreover, the richness of your character's characteristics will make you a real hero. The atmosphere of MACABRE dance superbly rendered by the graphics and texts, is not about to let you go... good luck!
